query:
SELECT id,
                   title,
                   slug,
                   description,
                   geometry_type as "geometry_type: GeometryType",
                   (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT ST_SRID(f.geom)) = 1
                           THEN MIN(ST_SRID(f.geom))::int
                           ELSE NULL
                       END
                      FROM app.project_features f
                     WHERE f.collection_id = c.id
                       AND f.project_id = $1
                       AND f.status = ANY($4)
                   ) as storage_crs_srid,
                   (SELECT CASE
                               WHEN bbox IS NOT NULL THEN
                                   ARRAY[
                                       ST_XMin(bbox),
                                       ST_YMin(bbox),
                                       ST_XMax(bbox),
                                       ST_YMax(bbox)
                                   ]
                               ELSE NULL
                           END
                    FROM (
                        SELECT ST_Extent(ST_Transform(f.geom, $3))::geometry as bbox
                        FROM app.project_features f
                        WHERE f.collection_id = c.id
                          AND f.project_id = $1
                          AND f.status = ANY($4)
                    ) extent_sub) as extent
              FROM app.collections c
             WHERE (
                 EXISTS (
                     SELECT 1
                     FROM app.project_features f
                     WHERE f.collection_id = c.id
                       AND f.project_id = $1
                       AND f.status = ANY($4)
                 )
                 OR c.project_id = $1
             )
               AND c.id = $2
